website_summaries.verdict: Simple rectangular design that looks classy with an angled frame piece.
pros: Large 30-inch by 40-inch mirror can hang either vertically or horizontally
Very secure mirror construction with the glass mounted to a wooden core layer
Edges of mirror are polished for additional safety
cons: High price tag, but customers love the quality they receive

customer_reviews.title: Poor Glass quality
customer_reviews.text: Maybe 2 stars is a little tough because the mirror looks nice but I was disappointed in the glass quality of the mirror. The actual mirror looks really nice and came well packaged and in good shape. We were excited to put it up but now that we are using this new bathroom, we noticed that the glass quality is poor and our reflections are distorted in some parts of the mirror. if you are really close to the mirror its fine, but as soon as you move back a bit, the image is weird and distorted. For the price, I would have hoped they would use good quality mirror glass to make the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mladen Rados

customer_reviews.title: Best mirrors ever!
customer_reviews.text: We love these beautiful mirrors so much and visitors comment on them all the time. The packaging is incredible. They came with a wood protection frame all around them. The picture frame hooks it came with would do, but we did a better mounting with screws into wood. Pretty easy to hang, considering they are heavy. I'd make sure at least one side goes into wood and get a good drywall anchor for the other side. We actually removed drywall and did a strip of 1/2" plywood behind it to make sure it was really solid. Then we just tiled over all but where we hooked the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Best service and superior quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with our purchase. The quality of the mirror, the shipping, the care and detail that went into packaging to ensure the mirror arrived undamaged, all exceeded my expecatations! Lastly, I loved the old school customer service I received frim Hamilton Hills. They clearly care about my happiness and satisfaction with their products! Well done!!!
customer_reviews.author: suziespencer

customer_reviews.title: poorly made!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this mirror 2x now for a bathroom remodel and both times the mirrors have been defective. One time the glass did not line up in the corners and one time it did not line up along one side (large gap). Sadly, I would not recommend this mirror. It's a shame, because I really loved the mirror overall. :(
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M.

customer_reviews.title: The mirror is beautiful but edges didn't line up and was very loose
customer_reviews.text: Mirror was delivered with one section of the beveled edge backing is broken. The mirror is beautiful but edges didn't line up and was very loose. We have to send it back, not worth the 189.99. The next mirror could be worse than this mirror. So disappointed!!! Merry Christmas, NOT!!! Such a hassle, it's a huge mirror and heavy...
customer_reviews.author: Peppermint

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Hills is an amazing company to work with!
customer_reviews.text: Hamilton Hills is an amazing company to work with! I ordered two of these mirrors, they are beautiful, quality is exceptional and the price was the best! The mirrors arrived in good condition with the exception of one had which a few nicks on the rim of the frame backing. Hamilton Hills representative, Jonathan, asked for feedback on the condition of arrival. I responded and mention the nicks but planned to just try to match the color and fix it ourselves. But, oh no, Hamilton Mills replaced the mirror!!! This company and their products are so exceptional I decided to order another mirror for a bedroom in our home. I definitely give the highest recommendation to this company!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these mirrors. Two of the 24x36s and a 30x40 for bathroom vanity mirrors. They are extremely well made and so easy to wipe clean. The company is also wonderful with customer satisfaction as I was written to make sure I was completely satisfied with them. Would not hesitate to order these again.
customer_reviews.author: jBrooke

customer_reviews.title: Stunning and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY STUNNING! I could not be happier with this purchase. I bought two to hang above our sinks in our bathroom remodel. I have carrera marble and gray walls. I've also used chrome fixtures and it looks so pretty all together. The mirror is REALLY well-made, it was packaged with care, and arrived without any problems at all. I would not hesitate to order from this company again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Eckert

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and Easy to Hang
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is absolutely stunning. It arrived quickly, was very, very well packaged. We just remodeled a bathroom and tried four other mirrors from other sellers. This is the icing on the cake.
customer_reviews.author: pmdw

customer_reviews.title: Not only are they beautiful and fairly priced for the size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these mirrors for bathrooms in my house. Not only are they beautiful and fairly priced for the size, when one arrived broken (a fact which I didn't discover until after the return date because my remodeling is going slower than expected) Hamilton Hills immediately sent me a brand new mirror that was undamaged. The customer service was great and just a pleasure to work with. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Corey

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous ordering a mirror online. This company did an amazing job figuring out what packaging works best and the 2 mirrors I ordered arrived in tact. In addition the mirrors are beautiful and I will describe them as nothing short of great craftsmanship. I will use this company for my future needs and recommend that anyone else out there concerned about ordering a mirror online should feel comfortable ordering from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The larger mirror (30x40) really looked good--so good that I bought a smaller one as well for another room. The smaller is great, but the larger's images are distorted.
customer_reviews.author: G. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I hired a contractor, they had a designer that helped with selections but I couldn’t find a mirror (in this case 2 mirrors) for my master bath update. I took a chance and ordered these and boy am I happy! They shipped quickly and look awesome. Very classy and look great with the third designer mirror I had picked out.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Denise

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors are of such great quality. I was so concerned about them being shipped and damaged in the process but they came perfect to my front door. The delivery man even brought them into the house because the boxes were huge and awkwardly sized. They look fantastic and super high end. I usually would purchase home decor from Homegoods but it is often hard to get two of the same item from stores like that. These are just like it and are well worth the price. Really, just do it!
customer_reviews.author: JBOrganizer

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with these mirrors
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with these mirrors! Bought for our new master bath and they look so elegant. I was going for a spa look and I think I got it. I'm trying to add a picture but it's not letting me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defects in mirror.  Examine it thoroughly when it arrives.
customer_reviews.text: Really liked it, but I noticed defects in the mirror in several places. (Pics to come). Would have returned, but when it arrived I just looked for breaks and cracks. Didn’t actually hang it for almost 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS MIRROR
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with the beauty of this mirror. It made our small guest bathroom look like it belonged in a palace. It is fairly heavy so we asked our "handyman" to help hang it. It is absolutely beautiful. I would like to see more things that you sell.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: Expedient Work
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for the quick delivery of the mirror we bought through you. I hope to have a picture sent to you once the master bathroom is completed. Again thank you for expedient work and craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: Favorite all time Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE this Mirror!!! Very elegant, goes with everything! The packaging was phenomenal! I was very scared to order the mirror and having it arrived cracked. Nothing to worry about! The packaging was beyond secured! I highly recommend this mirror! I would order it again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful mirror that arrived not broken
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a different mirror prior to buying this beautiful one. The other mirror arrived broken twice so I gave up. When I received this mirror, I was happy the other ones arrived damaged because this one is so much nicer. It is very elegant. It is well made and looks fabulous in my office.
customer_reviews.author: PlasticJackie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror and a great value!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mirror for a downstairs bathroom renovation. Well packaged and the seller even checked in to see how the delivery. The mirror is well constructed with thick mirror panels and mounting hardware. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looking Good!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror was packed beautifully and arrived in perfect condition. It looks great with the new bathroom vanity and our contractor was very pleased with it as well. Great product at a good price...highly recommended. A photo is attached. Vanity is from Signature Hardware, quartz top from InStyle (Charlotte) Grohe faucet, and over mirror light from Lowe's.
customer_reviews.author: dowagerton

customer_reviews.title: Very Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is absolutely beautiful. You can see the construction is top notch as the piece is very heavy and well made. Fortunately it didn't work in the space we had initially intended, which was the master bath - so it's been hung in the living room where it gets complemented weekly! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Cara

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors elevated the bathroom to a whole other level with elegance. The mirrors are great quality and definitely worth the price! I believe it was easy to install the security features were great! It’s definitely brings a elegant, moderate and classy look to any room whether you decide to put it vertical or horizontal. :)
customer_reviews.author: msjones

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Well designed and wall attachment is precise
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Well designed and wall attachment is precise. We mounted two mirrors using the same measurement and they aligned perfectly. One mirror was damaged in transit but exchange was quick.
customer_reviews.author: longo304

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: My expectations were pretty high! These mirrors exceeded them! Have seen mirrors of less quality for twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: The Melton Team

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, and looks great in my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is well made, beautiful, and looks great in my bathroom. the first mirror that was sent had a defect (some of the silver missing on one edge), and the seller addressed the issue promptly and sent a new mirror. Can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: tango

customer_reviews.title: Good for a while...
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror, and it lasted well for about a year. However, at around the year mark, the bottom of the mirror began to turn colors. It is gradually getting worse
customer_reviews.author: LB NJ

customer_reviews.title: The mirror distorts images from a few feet away,
customer_reviews.text: The mirror distorts images from a few feet away, but we got stuck with it because it's too heavy to return
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These mirrors are beyond beautiful. I ordered 3 for my master bathroom
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors are beyond beautiful. I ordered 3 for my master bathroom. One had minor damage during deliver and the issue was resolved immediately by the seller. The mirrors are the nicest mirrors I have ever seen, such a high quality and definelty high end. I highly recommend the mirror and seller. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely love this mirror and everyone who walks in our bathroom ...
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this mirror and everyone who walks in our bathroom remarks on it. It came well packaged - no nicks or chips. It is a substantial mirror so take your time with the installation. I will be buying the larger one for our next bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel789

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, exactly as described. I was especially impressed with the quality of the packaging. It arrived with no damage as a result. I did have to adjust the height of one of the pre-installed hangers as one was off. It was an easy adjustment, but not something I would have expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: It arrived safely
customer_reviews.text: Seems durable and well built, arrived with no damage. Do not use the nails it comes with to hang it in your dry wall, go get anchors and hang it with screws, you do not want this expensive piece falling off the wall.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: I loved my neighbor's mirror so I bought one too.
customer_reviews.text: I saw this mirror at a friend's home and loved it, so I bought one for our bathroom remodel. I came perfect in the package but we have not hung it yet. So that is all I can say at this point.
customer_reviews.author: A fellow conservative

customer_reviews.title: Not for Bathrooms
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is beautiful but after a year in my bathroom the mirror has rusted. I would have ordered something else had i known its not suitable for bathroom use.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: We are using this mirror as a vanity mirror. It's our fifth mirror for this vanity, but this is the first from Hamilton Hills and the first from Amazon. 2 arrived broken/chipped, 1 was the wrong mirror, and 1 fell off the wall and shattered. This mirror is by far the best quality of the five, was very well packed, and we're completely satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: TERRY E ORFANOS

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE MIRRORS.
customer_reviews.text: Our mirrors arrived in perfect condition and my husband and I just hung them up. They are absolutely gorgeous and the quality is so impressive. I looked for a while for new mirrors for our master bathroom and researched on line and in the stores. We are furnishing our new home and I will definitely order from them again. Thank you Hamilton Hills for maintaining such high quality and standards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful only wish they offered it in a wider size. Arrived well packaged, no scratches or dings.
customer_reviews.author: Kac

customer_reviews.title: Nice product + great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The mirrors arrived well packaged. They are good quality and gorgeous. One of the two mirrors we ordered had a small imperfection in it and after one quick email to the manufacturer, they made it good for us. We appreciate their great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mirrors
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these mirrors for our newly renovated bathroom. They are beautiful and have a stunning architectural look to them. They look far more expensive than the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Wannamaker

customer_reviews.title: I finally decided to purchase the large mirror framed mirror and I’m so happy I did
customer_reviews.text: After researching and shopping, I finally decided to purchase the large mirror framed mirror and I’m so happy I did! You can see the excellent workmanship on back and front of mirror. It looks far more expensive than it is. No damage whatsoever during shipping. They definitely know how to wrap a mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C. Lamle

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL MIRROR!!!
customer_reviews.text: Mirror arrived so quickly and intact--I was worried. Very well packed. A beautiful mirror that will be perfect in our remodeled bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: LARSON

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Worth buying and beautiful, just wish my USPS guy wasn't so rough with it. I recieved mines broken both times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful mirror. However, the first mirror had black spots so I got a replacement; and the second one has black spots that are more noticeable. Need better quality control. Very disappointed that I have to send this one back as well.
customer_reviews.author: tayla patterson

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this mirror and now that I've seen it
customer_reviews.text: High quality, well packaged, reasonably priced. Very satisfied with this mirror and now that I've seen it, I'll buy it in another size.
customer_reviews.author: Allyn

customer_reviews.title: Great price for an awesome mirror
customer_reviews.text: Great price for an awesome mirror. Similiar mirrors at large retailers were twice the price. We love the mirror, it arrived in perfect condition and looks great. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: vgd123

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice mirror. Adds a lot of bling to the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: iamrhpos

customer_reviews.title: ... not what I expected the product was a very nice mirror which is why I put it at a ...
customer_reviews.text: I searched medicine cabinet and this popped up was not what I expected the product was a very nice mirror which is why I put it at a 5. The description to me off but didn’t reflect on the actual product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous. Well made, easy to hang. I had a minor problem and it was handled quickly and smoothly. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Kraol

customer_reviews.title: It is very well made and design is great. Also it was packaged very well
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding product. It is very well made and design is great. Also it was packaged very well, meaning the mirror did not have even the slightest imperfection. I would buy this line every time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality mirror and contemporary styling
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the mirror to replace a very outdated one over a bathroom vanity. The mirror is beautiful and the mirror “frame” really makes it unique. Just the contemporary upgrade that we hoped for at long last.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Mirror is beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Mirror is beautiful!!! Looks even better than I imagined. I really like that it comes from a small family owned company(rare nowadays) that takes pride in their product and cares about its customer. The day I received the mirror I received an email asking if the product had any issues upon receipt(it didn't), but I like that they follow up. I would definitely buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Spec Ops

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful we haven't hung it yet but I can't wait. Packed perfectly couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: cheryl Collier

customer_reviews.title: Superior product and unmatched customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful mirrors that we purchased for the bathroom vanities of our new home! The owner Jonathan contacted us the day of delivery and mailed an express replacement for one of the mirrors that was cracked in transit. Truly an excellent product with customer service that can not be beat!! Highly recommend—ten out of five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Leah L.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality mirror and responsive vendor
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful mirror and the mirrored frame is a very nice addition. I did use screws to hang. The vendor was quick to respond to any issues
customer_reviews.author: Nyk

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is exactly what we wanted. I was concerned about shipping something that large, heavy and fragile but it arrived in perfect condition. One of the hangers was out of position but I was able to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: StanM

customer_reviews.title: Well made, attractive, well protected in shipping package
customer_reviews.text: The mirror we ordered and received is perfect. Well made, attractive, and with secure hangers built into it. I was impressed with the packaging for how well it protected the mirror. And, bonus, it was delivered a day ahead of schedule. I am definitely pleased with Hamilton Hills.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew F. in Conyers

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nice set of mirrors that were affordable for a new bathroom we added that is modern chic. This perfectly fits the bill! Great packing too!
customer_reviews.author: G, Bartol

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality mirror, probably the best mirror I've ever owned! The craftsmanship of the mirror is remarkable. Everything - from packaging to delivery was executed perfectly. I plan to buy another mirror in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Koval_olena

customer_reviews.title: ... of these for my Master Bath and they look great! I am
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these for my Master Bath and they look great! I am, however, noticing that they attract dust a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Vary nice could not be more pleased with this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: colleen shop lady

customer_reviews.title: Mirror bottom edges damaged and turning black from water
customer_reviews.text: Bottom of mirror closest to sink is turning black at the edges. So disappointing as it is only 3 1/2 months old. BUT the seller stood by their product and are replacing it. So delighted!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mirror for a bathroom remodel, and I absolutely love it! Upon arrival, it was packaged well and had no dings or scratches. I was searching for a mirror through Pottery Barn, but for the price and size of this mirror you can't go wrong. It's a very beautiful and elegant mirror!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: came broken and I have to return the product back.
customer_reviews.author: George Dante M Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is beautiful and was a good price it arrived quickly and in good condition
customer_reviews.author: Tawna naturkas

customer_reviews.title: So very pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: So very pleased!!!! I absolutely love the way they make my bathroom look. The mirrors were one of the last finishing touches on a complete bathroom remodel.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3Ss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing mirror. Well made and very sturdy. Excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Z

customer_reviews.title: Love it, used it in a powder room that ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, used it in a powder room that had a large wall to fill above the vanity. Solidly built, packaged great for shipping and hanging it was a breeze. I've gotten lots of compliments on this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: MrsW2

customer_reviews.title: look absolutely great! quality construction and perfect for our use
customer_reviews.text: look absolutely great ! quality construction and perfect for our use ! we purchased 4 mirrors and love their look !
customer_reviews.author: roscoe

customer_reviews.title: Top rim of mirror arrived unattached and shattered.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty mirror and packing seemed sturdy but this is the second time I have received this mirror broken. Not reordering a third time. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: R Smith

customer_reviews.title: This mirror is beautiful. I purchased it for my bathroom and the ...
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is beautiful. I purchased it for my bathroom and the quality is so much better than the one I replaced. This mirror would look fabulous in any room and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Lewis

customer_reviews.title: A perfect replacement for the typical frameless mirror that used to ...
customer_reviews.text: This mirror hangs well above our vanity backsplash which prevents the need for frequent cleaning and it added a wow factor to our remodeled bathroom. A perfect replacement for the typical frameless mirror that used to sit right on top of the backsplash. When I unpacked it I was pleasantly surprised how clean and bright it was.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: nice mirror only thing i had to adjust rear hanger ...
customer_reviews.text: nice mirror only thing i had to adjust rear hanger because it was off also mirror had super small defect but I'm very picky so i pick up on that most people wouldn't so i kept it.. over all happy
customer_reviews.author: KOS

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror. It looks like a high end mirror ...
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror. It looks like a high end mirror at a much lower cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for this mirror!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror looks great. It’s very heavy. It was easy to install and makes my powder room look amazing! I would purchase again. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Janene

customer_reviews.title: Securely packaged
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged, I will reuse the hardboard surround my mirror came in! My contractor hung it in my new bathroom and it is very secure. It is such a beautiful mirror with mirrored framing and bounces light around the room.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie G.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT! will be hanging it tomorrow
customer_reviews.text: Arrived sooner than we expected. GREAT! will be hanging it tomorrow. Love it! Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece at an affordable price. It took about 20 minutes to install and it looks gorgeous in our bathroom. Hamilton Hills provides a quality product at a very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These arrived very quickly and are beautiful. So happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Nanny Rosch

customer_reviews.title: item will not come when it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: my item did not come when it was supposed to. I needed it by a certain date and had to cancel the order and get something else because of this.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: The mirror's simplistic style & elegance works beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: Used in a small bathroom with hand painted tiles. The mirror's simplistic style & elegance works beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror very elegant and modern just his I like ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror very elegant and modern just his I like it. I will buy 2 more mirrors for my 2 bathrooms when is time to remodel. Highly recommended..

customer_reviews.title: N/A
customer_reviews.text: Mirror arrived broken so unable to testify of its durability or ease of install. It looked great, sad that I could not use it.

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror.
customer_reviews.text: Not installed yet, but the mirror is beautiful, it was packed impeccably, arrived safely. Can't wait to put it in my bathroom.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken in bottom piece
customer_reviews.text: Mirror came broken in the bottom Very upset cannot get in touch with customer service to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: kerry

customer_reviews.title: Very Beautiful mirrors
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! We purchased two for a master bath remodel and they look super high quality. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Kampf

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful mirror! It’s exactly what I was looking for and it was packaged very well to prevent any damage

customer_reviews.title: For $250, I expected better quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor Craftsmanship, expected better when you are paying $250 for the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks wonderful in my bathroom over my vanity
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous mirror! Looks wonderful in my bathroom over my vanity. It did arrive broken twice but Hamilton Hills worked with us and were great and handled the issue promptly.
customer_reviews.author: sherrybell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way.
customer_reviews.text: You will not be disappointed with this mirror. It's just beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R Bellinger

customer_reviews.title: missing parts.. the nails kit for hanging the mirror is missing..
customer_reviews.text: missing parts.. the nails kit for hanging the mirror is missing..
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: This small family owned company takes great pride in their products and they even included a ...
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is exactly as described and I have never seen a mirror packaged so well. This small family owned company takes great pride in their products and they even included a personal note in the package. I recommend this mirror. Not the best picture but it was hung in our powder room today.
customer_reviews.author: Spada Studio

customer_reviews.title: I ordered two mirrors and was so pleased with the quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two mirrors and was so pleased with the quality. They look beautiful in the bathroom. The mirrors look very expensive but I thought their price was very fair. I like that they were made in the USA. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality mirrors
customer_reviews.text: We looked and looked for beveled mirrors and could not find what we were looking for. Found Hamilton Hill's and fell in love with these. I put them up and I fell in love!! Such great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Arrived safely in perfect condition, well packed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived safely in perfect condition, well packed. The only reason I've given it 4 stars instead of 5 are the hangers provided I don't think will be adequate and will have to use better wall anchors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful. The quality is great
customer_reviews.text: Finally finished bathroom and put up my two new mirrors. They are beautiful. The quality is great. The packing was very secure. I am extremely satisfied with the product and highly recommend Hamilton for anyone in the market for mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D. Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror! Come in perfect condition with hanging instructions. Even looks better than the photo shown.
customer_reviews.author: jackie m cohen

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror, very substantial and looks great in my new spa bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mirror Completes My Bath Renovation
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is nicer than I anticipated and the price is reasonable. I am very pleased with my purchase and the follow up service was outstanding. Good company to work with. I was impressed. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Steven P. Philbin

customer_reviews.title: It will be returned, sadly because the mirror is completely broken.
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is shattered. I am disappointed that I have to return it and cannot use it.
customer_reviews.author: lynda g. mansfield

product_meta.title: Large Framed Wall Mirror with Angled Beveled Mirror Frame | Premium Silver Backed Glass Panel Vanity, Bedroom, or Bathroom | Luxury Mirrored Rectangle Hangs Horizontal or Vertical (20" x 30")
product_meta.description: Size:20" x 30"One of our absolute favorites this elegant 20" x 30" mirror framed mirror is a show piece for any room whether you are looking for a bathroom or powder room mirror or something in your dining, living room, waiting room or office. A substantial three inch angled mirror sides slope down to the large beveled rectangle wall mirror in the center. Our mirror comes secured to a solid wood backing to add stability and prevent distortion or warping. The wood backing includes our pre-installed slimline 1/4 inch hanging hardware hooks for hanging your mirror in both a horizontal or vertical fashion. The large central part is surrounded by a 2 1/4 inch mirror frame. We stand by our products and your happiness. USA Company with 3 Generations of Family Values.
feature_bullets: SOPHISTICATED DESIGN: Bring opulence and sophistication to any room with our 20" x 30" classy, angled, mirror framed, piece. Our premium, large, rectangular, mirror is surrounded by a substantial, 2 1/4 inch, angled, mirror, frame. Mirrored edges gently slope towards the beveled center. The large glass mirror is backed by our solid core wood for reinforcement and stability. Avoid the warping and distortion found in cheaper brands.

SAFE AND EASY TO INSTALL: Our authentic silver backed glass comes with safety polished edges for protection and a beautiful finished appearance. The glass is securely mounted to solid core wood. All mirrors come with reinforced D-ring hanging clips as well as wall hardware and screws to hang both horizontally or vertically .

3 GENERATIONS OF EXCELLENCE: Our family has been manufacturing and producing mirrors for over 3 generations. We stand by the quality of our product and your experience. A family owned business with simple principles. Affordable quality in America.

EXCEPTIONAL QUALITY: We use premium materials not found in other lesser quality imitation mirrors you will see. Our mirrors are made to strict trade-secret standards and pass a rigorous 8 point inspection. Every mirror comes with our certification of authenticity.
